trans-unit.source: Represents the settings for an activity that sends a message.
trans-unit.target: 代表活動傳送訊息的設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendSettings"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the endpoint to send messages to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定將訊息傳送至端點。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to send messages to.
Gets or sets the address of the endpoint to send messages to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定將訊息傳送至端點的位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the endpoint configuration.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定端點組態的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether communication is one-way.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值，指出是否為單向通訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if communication is one-way; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if communication is two-way.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果通訊是單向的。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果通訊是雙向的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display name of the owner.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定擁有者的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the owner.
Gets or sets a value that indicates the protection level for the message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出訊息的保護層級。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值的<xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow service instance should be persisted before sending the message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該傳送訊息之前保存工作流程服務執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow service should be persisted before sending the message; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該傳送的訊息; 之前保存工作流程服務否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the token impersonation level allowed for the receiver of the message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出訊息接收器所允許的權杖模擬等級。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值的<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>列舉型別。</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>
